snippet.title: Play It Pinball - PS2 Gameplay
snippet.description:
Known in Japan as "American Arcade", Play It Pinball was developed by Astroll and localised for the PAL region by System 3 under their Play It label.

The game contains a Challenge mode where it acts as a main campaign. You can choose one of the two tables to play for each round and when you attain the target score, you can choose to proceed to another table.

The game contains a grand total of 11 tables to play, each with their own theme.
